V05bsa068_u:2_0: śṛṇotu bhadantaḥ saṃgha ahamevaṃnāmā saṃghā tpravrajyopasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ yāce yadupasaṃpādayatu māṃ bhadantaḥ saṃgho 'nukampako 'nukampāmupādāya /
V05bsa068_u:2_1: [evaṃ trirapi vaktavyam / yācite paścādekena bhikṣuṇā evaṃ karaṇīyaṃ niṣadya prajñāpitavyam /
V05bsa068_u:2_2: ] śṛṇotu bhadantaḥ saṃghaḥ saṃghātpravrajyopasaṃpadadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ yācate /
V05bsa068_u:2_3: sacetsaṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣamate anujānīyātsaṃgho yatsaṃgha evaṃnāmānaṃ pravrājayate upasaṃpādayedeṣā jñaptiḥ /
V05bsa068_u:2_4: [evaṃ hi kāryam /] śṛṇotu bhadantaḥ saṃghaḥ ayamevaṃnāmā saṃghāt pravrajyopasaṃpadaṃ [bhikṣubhāvaṃ] yācate tatsaṃghaḥ evaṃnāmānaṃ pravrājayati upasaṃpādayati /
V05bsa068_u:2_5: yeṣāmāyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate evaṃnāmānaṃ pravrājayantaṃ upasaṃpādayituṃ te tūṣṇīm /
V05bsa068_u:2_7: [iyaṃ prathamā karmavācanā / evaṃ dvirapi trirapi /] pravrājitaṃ upasaṃpāditamevaṃnāmā saṃghena kṣāntamanujñātaṃ yasmāttūṣṇīmevametaddhārayāmi /
V05bsa068_u:3_0: [eṣa hi pūrvavidhiḥ /] samanvāhara ahamevaṃnāmā buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryam /
V05bsa068_u:3_4: samanvāhara ācārya yathā te āryāḥ arhanto yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātaṃ prahāya prāṇātipātātprativiratā evamahamevaṃnāmā yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇānipātātprativiramāmi /
V05bsa068_u:3_5: anenāhaṃ prathamenāṅgena teṣāmāryāṇāmarhatāṃ śikṣāyāmanuśikṣe anuvidhīye anukaromi /
V05bsa068_u:3_6_0: yathā te āryāḥ yāvajjīvamadattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānaṃ prahāya surāmaireyapramādasthānātprativiratāḥ
V05bsa068_u:3_6_1: evamevāhamevaṃnāmā yāvajjīvamadattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānaṃ prahāya surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānātprativiramāmi /
V05bsa068_u:3_7: anena pañcamenāṅgena teṣāmāryāṇāmarhatāṃ śikṣāyāmanuśikṣe anuvidhīye anukaromi /
V05bsa068_u:3_8: bhadantāḥ samanvāhriyaṃtāṃ ayamevaṃnāmā evaṃnāmraḥ [upādhyāyāt] gṛhītāvadātavasanaḥ anavatāritakeśaśmaśrurākāṃkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitum /
V05bsa068_u:3_9: soyamevaṃnāmā evaṃnāmnopādhyāyena svākhyāte dharmavinaye keśaśmaśruvatārya kāṣāyāṇi vasrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanāgārikāṃ pravrajisyati /

V05bsa068_u:4_4: taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ śākyasiṃhaṃ śākyādhirājaṃ tathāgataṃ arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ pravrajitamanupravrajāmi /

V05bsa068_u:5_23: ayaṃ satyakālaḥ / yaccāhaṃ kiñcitpṛcchāmi tattvayā lajjitena [mā] bhūtvā bhūtaṃ ca bhūtato vaktavyaṃ abhūtaṃ ca abhūtato 'nirveṭhayitavyam /

V05bsa068_u:10_4: kaḥ punarvādī dvayadvayasamāpattyā abrahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ dharmaṃ pratisevitum /
V05bsa068_u:10_5: uktaṃ caitadāyuṣman tena bhāgavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samyak saṃbuddhena /
V05bsa068_u:10_6_0: yaḥ punarbhikṣubhiḥ sārdhaṃ śikṣāsāmīcīṃ samāpannaḥ śikṣāmapratyākhyāya śikṣādaurvalyamanāviṣkṛtyābrahmacaryaṃ maithunaṃ
V05bsa068_u:10_6_1: dharmaṃ pratisevate antatastiryagyonigatayāpi sārdhaṃ evaṃrūpaṃ sthānamadhyāpadya sahādhyāpattyā abhikṣurbhavatyaśramaṇaḥ
V05bsa068_u:10_6_2: aśākyaputrīyaḥ dhvasyate bhikṣubhāvāt hataśrāmaṇyaṃ dhvastaṃ mathitaṃ patitaṃ parājitamapratyudvāryamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyam /
V05bsa068_u:10_7: tadyathā tālo mastakāchinnaḥ abhavyo viruḍhiṃ vṛddhiṃ vipulatāmapattum /
V05bsa068_u:10_8: atra te adyāgreṇa avadyācāreṇa adhyāpattyāvadyācāravairamaṇyā tīvracatesā ārakṣasmṛtyā pramāde yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
V05bsa068_u:11_0: śṛṇu tvamāyuṣman anekaparyāyeṇa bhagavatā adattādānaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ vigarhitaṃ adattādānavirati stutā stomitā varṇitā praśastā /
V05bsa068_u:11_1: adyāgreṇa te āyuṣman steyacittena tilatuṣamapi parakyamadattamādātavyaṃ kaḥ punarvādaḥ pañcamāṣikaṃ vā uttarapañcamāṣikaṃ vā /
V05bsa068_u:11_2: uktametadāyuṣmaṃstena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena /
V05bsa068_u:11_3_0: yaḥ punarbhikṣurgrāmagatamaraṇyagataṃ vā pareṣāṃ adattaṃ steyasaṃkhyātamādadīta yadrūpeṇādattādānena rājā vainaṃ gṛhītvā
V05bsa068_u:11_3_1: rājamātro vā hanyādvā saṃvadhrīyādvā pravāsayedvā evaṃ cainaṃ vadet- tvaṃ bhoḥ puiruṣa cauro 'si bālo 'si muḍho 'si steno
V05bsa068_u:11_3_2: 'sī tyevaṃrūpaṃ sthānamadhyāpadya sahādhyāpattyā abhikṣurbhavati [aśramaṇaḥ aśākyaputrīyaḥ dhvasyate bhikṣubhāvāt itaśrāmaṇyaṃ
V05bsa068_u:11_3_3: dhvastaṃ mathitaṃ patitaṃ parājitamapramyudvāryamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṃ /
V05bsa068_u:11_4: ] tadyathā tālo mastakāchinnaḥ [abhavyo haritatvāya abhavyo viruḍhiṃ vṛddhiṃ vipulatāmāpattum /
V05bsa068_u:11_5: atra te adhyāgreṇa avadyācāreṇa adhyāpattyāvadyācāravairamaṇyāṃ tīvracetasā ārakṣāsmṛtyā pramāde yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
V05bsa068_u:11_7: ] nādhyāpatsye / śṛṇu tvamevaṃnāman anekaparyayeṇa bhagavatā prāṇātipāto vigarhitaḥ prāṇātipātaviratiḥ stutā stomitā vanditā praśasta /
V05bsa068_u:11_8: adyāgreṇa te āyuṣman [saṃci]ntya kuntapipilako 'pi prāṇeṣu jīvitāt na vyaparopayitavyaḥ kaḥ punarvādo manuṣyavigrahaṃ vā /
V05bsa068_u:12_0: uktaṃ caitadāyuṣmaṃstena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samyak saṃbuddhena /
V05bsa068_u:12_1_0: yaḥ punarbhikṣumanuṣyaṃ vā manuṣmavigrahaṃ vā svahastena saṃcintya jīvitād vyaparopayet śasraṃ vaināmāghārayet śastradhārakaṃ
V05bsa068_u:12_1_1: vāsya paryeṣet maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayeta maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsyānusaṃvarṇayet /
V05bsa068_u:12_2_0: evaṃ cainaṃ vadet- haṃbhoḥ puruṣa kiṃ tvayā pāpakenāśucinā durjīvitena mṛtaṃ te bhoḥ puruṣa jīvitādvaramiticintānumataiścittasaṃkalpairanakeparyāyeṇa
V05bsa068_u:12_2_1: maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpayet maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsya anusaṃvarṇayet sa ca tena kālaṃ kuryādityevaṃrūpo bhikṣuḥ sthānamadhyāpadya
V05bsa068_u:12_2_2: sahādhyāpattyā abhikṣurbhavati aśramaṇaḥ aśākyaputrīyaḥ [dhvasyate bhikṣumāvāt hataśrāmaṇyaṃ dhvastaṃ mathitaṃ patitaṃ parājitamapratyudvāryamasya
V05bsa068_u:12_3: tadyathā tālo mastakāchinnaḥ abhavyo haritvāya abhavyo viruḍhiṃ vṛddhiṃ vipulatāmapattum /
V05bsa068_u:12_4: adya te adyāgreṇa avadyācāreṇa adhyāpattyāvadyācāravairamaṇyāṃ tīvracetasā ārākṣasmṛtyā pramāde yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ kiñcidevarūpaṃ sthānaṃ nādhyāpatsyase /
V05bsa068_u:12_5: nādhyāpatsye /] śṛṇu tvamāyuṣman anekaparyāyeṇa bhagavatā mṛṣāvādo vigarhitaḥ mṛṣāvādaviratiḥ stutā stomitā vanditā praśastā /
V05bsa068_u:13_0: adyāgreṇa te āyuṣman hāsyaprekṣaṇo 'pi saṃprajānamṛṣāvāk na bhāṣitavyā kaḥ punarvādo 'santamasaṃvidyamānamuttarasanuṣyadharmaṃ pralapitum /
V05bsa068_u:13_1: uktaṃ caitat āyuṣman tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samyak saṃbuddhena /
V05bsa068_u:13_2_1: vā sparśavihāratāṃ vā pratijānīyādidaṃ jānāmīdaṃ paśyāmīti sa pareṇa samayena samanuyujyamāno vā asamanuyujyamāno vā āpanno
V05bsa068_u:13_2_2: viśurddhiṃ prekṣyaivaṃ vadedajānannevāhamāyuṣmanato 'vīcaṃ jānāmīti paśyāmiti[riktam tucchaṃ mṛṣāvyapalapanamanyatrābhimānāt
V05bsa068_u:13_3: ] ki jānāsi / duḥkhaṃ jānāmi / samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgaṃ jānāmi /
V05bsa068_u:13_4: kiṃ paśyasi / devān paśyāmi / nāgān yakṣān gandharvān kinnarān mahoragān pretān piśācān kumbhāṇḍān kaṭaputanān [paśyāmi /
V05bsa068_u:13_5: devāḥ api māṃ paśyanti / nāgāḥ yakṣāḥ gandharvāḥ kinnarāḥ mahoragāḥ pretāḥ piśācāḥ kunbhāṇḍāḥ kaṭapūtanāḥ api māṃ paśyanti /
V05bsa068_u:13_6: devānāṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇomi / nāgānāṃ yāvatkaṭapūtānāṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇomi /
V05bsa068_u:13_8: nāgāḥ yāvatkaṭapūtanāḥ api mama śabdaṃ śṛṇvanti /
V05bsa068_u:13_11: devāḥ api māṃ darśanāya upasaṃkrāmanti nāgāḥ yāvatkaṭapūtanāḥ api māṃ darśanāya upasaṃkrāmanti /
V05bsa068_u:13_12: devaiḥ sārdhamālapāmi saṃlapāmi pratisaṃmode sātatyaṃ samāpadye /
V05bsa068_u:13_13: nāgaiḥ yāvatkaṭapūtanaiḥ sārdhamālapāmi saṃlapāmi pratisaṃmode sātatyaṃ samāpadyae /
V05bsa068_u:13_14: devāḥ api mayā sārdhamālapanti saṃlapanti pratisaṃbhodante sātatyaṃ samāpadyante /
V05bsa068_u:13_15: nāgā yāvatkaṭapūtanāḥ api mayā sārdhamālapanti saṃlapanti pratisaṃmodante sātatyaṃ samāpadyante /
V05bsa068_u:13_16: alabhye vasan anityasaṃjñayā labhyohamasmi ityātmānaṃ pratijānīte /
V05bsa068_u:13_17: anitye duḥkhasaṃjñayā duḥkhe anātmasaṃjñayā āhāre pratikūlasaṃjñayā sarvaloke anabhiratisaṃjñayā ālokasaṃjñayā praharaṇasaṃjñayā virāgasaṃjñayā nirodhasaṃjñayā maraṇasaṃjñayā /
V05bsa068_u:13_18: alamye vasan aśubhasaṃjñayā na śubhasaṃjñayā alammohamasmi ityātmānaṃ pratijānīte /
V05bsa068_u:13_19: vinīlakasaṃjñayā vipūyakasaṃjñayā vyātmākakasaṃjñayā vipadmakasaṃjñayā vikhāditasaṃjñayā vilohitakasaṃjñayā vikṣiptakasaṃjñayā /
V05bsa068_u:14_0_0: alamye vasan prayamasya dhyānasya dvitīvasya tṛtīyasya caturthasya dhānayya maitryāḥ karuṇāyāḥ muditāyāḥ upekṣāyāḥ ākāśāntyāyatanasya
V05bsa068_u:14_0_1: vijñānānantyāyatanasya akiñcinyāyatanasya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya srotāpattiphalasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasya anāgāmiphalasya
V05bsa068_u:14_0_2: [arhattvaphalasya] ṛddhiviṣayasya divassa śrotasya cetaḥparyāyasya pūrvanivāsasya cayutyupahānasya anarhanneva samāno 'hamasmi
V05bsa068_u:14_1: anyatra pratimānāt ityevaṃrūpaṃ bhikṣuḥ sthānamavapadya sahādhyāpattyā abhikṣurbhavati /
V05bsa068_u:14_2: aśramaṇaḥ aśākyaputrīyaḥ dhvasyate bhikṣubhāvāt hatamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṃ dhvastaṃ mathitaṃ patitaṃ parājitaṃ apratyudvāryamasya bhavati śrāmaṇyam /
V05bsa068_u:14_3: tadyathā tālo mastakācchinnaḥ abhavyo haritatvāya abhavyo virūḍhiṃ vṛddhiṃ vipulatāṃ āpattum /
V05bsa068_u:14_4: atra me adyāgreṇa anadhyācāre anadhyāpattyā anadhyācāravairamaṇyāṃ tīvracetasā ārakṣasmṛtyā pramāde yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
V05bsa068_u:14_8: ] śṛṇu tvamāyuṣman catvāraḥ ime tena bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samyak saṃbuddhena śramaṇakārakāḥ dharmāḥ ākhyātāḥ katame catvāraḥ /
V05bsa068_u:15_0: ākruṣṭena na pratyākroṣṭavyam roṣitena na pratiroṣitavyam /
V05bsa068_u:15_1: tāḍitena na pratitāḍitavyam bhaṇḍitena na pratibhaṇḍitavyam //
V05bsa068_u:16_1: na adhyāpatsye / śṛṇu tvamāyutman yaste abhūt pūīrvamāśākaḥ kaścidahaṃ labheyaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ ca /
V05bsa068_u:16_2_0: satvametarhi pravrajitaṃ upasaṃpamnam pratirūpeṇa upādhyāyeṇa pratirūpābhyāmācāryābhyāṃ samagreṇa saṃghena [jña]pticaturthena
V05bsa068_u:16_2_1: karmaṇā akopyena anāsthāpanarheṇa yatra varṣaśatopasaṃpannena bhikṣuṇā śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ tatra tadahopasaṃpannena iti
V05bsa068_u:16_2_2: yatra samānaśīlatā samānaśikṣatā samānaprātimokṣasūtroddeśatā sā adyāgreṇa ārāgayitavyā na virāgayitavyā /
V05bsa068_u:16_3: adyāgreṇa te upādhyāsyāntike pitṛsaṃjñā sthāpayitavyā upādhyāyenāpi tavānnike putrasaṃjñā upasthāpayitavyā adyāgreṇa te upādhyāyo yāvajjīvaṃ upasthāpayitavyaḥ /
V05bsa068_u:16_4: upādhyāyenāpi tvaṃ glānaḥ upasthāpayitavyaḥ āmaraṇāya vā vyutthānāya vā /
V05bsa068_u:16_5: adyāgreṇa te sagauraveṇa vihartavyam sapratiśeṇa sabhayavaśavarttinā sabrahmacāriṣu sthavireṣu madhyeṣu navakeṣu /
V05bsa068_u:16_6_0: adyāgreṇa te uddeṣṭavyam paṭhitavyaṃ svādhyāyitavyaṃ skandhakauśalyaṃ dhātukauśalyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ āyatanakauśalyaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ
V05bsa068_u:16_6_1: sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ dhūḥca tena nikṣeptavyā aprāptasya prāptaye anadhigatasyādhigamāya asākṣātkṛtasya sākṣātkriyāyai imāni
V05bsa068_u:16_6_2: ca te mayā audārikaudārikāni śikṣāpadāni ākhyātāni anyāni vā tāni anvardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśe uddiśyamāne śroṣyasi
V05bsa068_u:16_7: samānopādhyāyāḥ samānācāryāḥ āptakāḥ saṃlaptakāḥ saṃsutakā sapremakāḥ /
